S06n558:1: tena khalu punaḥ samayena śakro devānāmindrastasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatitaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇo'bhūt catvāriṃśatā trāyastriṃśatkāyikairdevaputrasahasraiḥ sārdham |
S06n558:4: pañca ca śuddhāvāsānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi tasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatitāni saṃniṣaṇṇānyabhūvan |
S06n558:7: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat-imānyārya subhūte saṃbahulāni devaputrasahasrāṇi asyāṃ parṣadi saṃnipatitāni saṃniṣaṇṇāni āryasya subhūterantikātprajñāpāramitāṃ śrotukāmāni bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmupadeśamavavādānuśāsanīṃ ca |
S06n558:11: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha-tena hi kauśika upadekṣyāmi te buddhānubhāvena buddhatejasā buddhādhiṣṭhānena |
S06n558:15: na te bhavyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayitum |
S06n558:18: abhavyā hi te punaḥ punaḥ saṃsaraṇāya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayitum |
S06n558:22: viśiṣṭebhyo hi dharmebhyo viśiṣṭatamā dharmā adhyālambitavyāḥ ||
S06n558:23: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimāmantrayate sma-sādhu sādhu subhūte,
S06n558:28: paurvakāṇāṃ hi bhagavaṃstathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantike'smadarthe bhagavān yathā brahmacaryaṃ bodhāya caran pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūta eva san,
S06n558:31: evaṃ bhagavan asmābhirapi bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuparigrahītavyā anuparivārayitavyāśca,
S06n558:34: asmābhirapi hi bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuparigṛhītā anuparivāritāśca,
S06n558:36: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindramāmantrayate sma-tena hi kauśika śṛṇu,
S06n558:37: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru,
S06n558:38: bhāṣiṣye'haṃ te yathā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam |
S06n558:39: śūnyatāyāṃ kauśika tiṣṭhatā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam |
S06n558:40: tena hi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhena bhavitavyam |
S06n558:42: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu |
S06n558:109: srotaāpannāḥ saptakṛto bhavaparamā iti na sthātavyam |
S06n558:111: sakṛdāgāmyapariniṣṭhitattvātsakṛdimaṃ lokamāgamya duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyatīti na sthātavyam |
S06n558:112: anāgāmī dakṣiṇīya iti na sthātavyam anāgāmī anāgamya imaṃ lokaṃ tatraiva parinirvāsyatīti na sthātavyam |
S06n558:114: arhannihaiva anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyatīti na sthātavyam |
S06n558:116: pratyekabuddho'tikramya śrāvakabhūmimaprāpya buddhabhūmiṃ parinirvāsyatīti na sthātavyam |
S06n558:118: buddho'tikramya pṛthagjanabhūmimatikramya śrāvakabhūmimatikramya pratyekabuddhabhūmimaprabheyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmarthaṃ kṛtvā aprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyāni sattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi parinirvāpya aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān sattvān śrāvakapratyekabuddhasamyaksaṃbuddhatvaniyatān kṛtvā buddhabhūmau sthitvā buddhakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau buddhaparinirvāṇena parinirvāsyati ityevamapyanena na sthātavyam ||
S06n558:119: atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitadabhavat-yadi buddho'tikramya pṛthagjanabhūmimatikramya śrāvakabhūmimatikramya pratyekabuddhabhūmimaprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmarthaṃ kṛtvā aprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyāni sattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi parinirvāpya aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān sattvān śrāvakapratyekabuddhasamyaksaṃbuddhatvaniyatān kṛtvā buddhabhūmau sthitvā buddhakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau buddhaparinirvāṇena parinirvāsyati ityevamapyanena na sthātavyam,
S06n558:122: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat-tatkiṃ manyase āyuṣman śāriputra kva tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sthitaḥ?
S06n558:123: āyuṣmān śāriputra āha-na kvacidāyuṣman subhūte tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sthitaḥ |
S06n558:126: sa naiva saṃskṛte dhātau sthito nāpyasaṃskṛte dhātau sthito na ca tato vyutthitaḥ ||
S06n558:127: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat-evameva āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyam,
S06n558:128: evaṃ śikṣitavyam-yathā tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho na kvacitsthito nāsthito na viṣṭhito nāviṣṭhitaḥ,
S06n558:134: yathā tathāgatasthānaṃ tathā sthāsyāmīti susthito'sthānayogeneti evamatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyamevaṃ śikṣitavyam |
S06n558:135: evaṃ hi śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viharatyanena prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa avirahitaścānena manasikāreṇeti ||
S06n558:136: atha khalu tatra parṣadi keṣāṃciddevaputrāṇāmetadabhūt-yāni tāni yakṣāṇāṃ yakṣabhāṣitāni yakṣarutāni yakṣapadāni yakṣamantritāni yakṣapravyāhṛtāni,
S06n558:138: na punaridaṃ vijñāyate yatsubhūtiḥ sthaviro bhāṣate pravyāharati deśayatyupadiśati |
S06n558:139: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāmimamevaṃrūpaṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya tān devaputrānāmantrayate sma-na vijñāyate na vijñāyate idaṃ devaputrāḥ |
S06n558:142: atha khalu teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ punarevaitadabhūt-uttānīkariṣyati bata ayamāryasubhūtiḥ |
S06n558:147: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena punarapi teṣāmeva devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya tān devaputrānāmantrayate sma-tena hi devaputrāḥ yaḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptukāmaḥ srotaāpattiphale sthātukāmaḥ,
S06n558:157: atha khalu punarapi teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāmetadabhavat-kiṃrūpā asya āryasubhūterdhārmaśravaṇikā eṣṭavyāḥ?
S06n558:158: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya tān devaputrānāmantrayate sma-māyānirmitasadṛśā hi devaputrā mama dhārmaśravaṇikā eṣṭavyāḥ |
S06n558:160: tathā hi te naiva śroṣyanti na ca sākṣātkariṣyanti ||
S06n558:161: atha khalu te devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocan-kiṃ punarārya subhūte māyopamāste sattvā na te māyā?
S06n558:162: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtistān devaputrānetadavocat-māyopamāste devaputrāḥ sattvāḥ |
S06n558:164: iti hi māyā ca sattvāśca advayametadadvaidhīkāram,
S06n558:176: atha khalu devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocan-samyaksaṃbuddho'pyārya subhūte māyopamaḥ svapnopama iti vadasi?
S06n558:180: te devaputrā āhuḥ-nirvāṇamapyārya subhūte māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadasi?
S06n558:181: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha-tadyadi devaputrā nirvāṇādapyanyaḥ kaściddharmo viśiṣṭataraḥ syāt,
S06n558:183: iti hi devaputrā māyā ca nirvāṇaṃ ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram |
S06n558:184: iti hi svapnaśca nirvāṇaṃ ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram ||
S06n558:190: anye ca mahāśrāvakā anekairbodhisattvasahasraiḥ sārdhamāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthaviramāmantrayante sma-ke'syā āyuṣman subhūte prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ nirdiśyamānāyāḥ pratyeṣakā bhaviṣyanti?
S06n558:191: atha khalvāyuṣmānānandastān sthavirānetadavocat-te khalvāyuṣmanto veditavyā avinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S06n558:194: ye'syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ nirdiśyamānāyāḥ pratyeṣakā bhaviṣyanti ||
S06n558:195: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthavirastān sthavirānetadavocat-nāsyā āyuṣmantaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ nirdiśyamānāyāḥ kecitpratyeṣakā bhaviṣyanti |
S06n558:203: tathaivāsyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ nirdiśyamānāyā na kaścitpratyeṣako bhaviṣyati ||
S06n558:204: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt- asya dharmaparyāyasya āryeṇa subhūnitā bhāṣyamāṇasya pūjārthaṃ yannvahaṃ puṣpāṇyabhinirmāya āryaṃ subhūtimabhyavakireyamiti |
S06n558:205: atha khalu śakro devānāmindrastasyāṃ velāyāṃ puṣpāṇyabhinirmāya āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimabhyavākirat |
S06n558:206: atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ subhūteḥ sthavirasya śakraṃ devānāmindramanuvyāharaṇāyaitadabhūt-na khalu punarimāni puṣpāṇi mayā trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu pracaranti dṛṣṭapūrvāṇi,
S06n558:212: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmataḥ subhūteścetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-anirjātānyetānyārya subhūte puṣpāṇi |
S06n558:216: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat-yattvaṃ kauśika evaṃ vadasi-anirjātānyetāni puṣpāṇi,
S06n558:220: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt-gambhīraprajño batāyamāryaḥ subhūtiḥ |
S06n558:225: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmataṃ subhūtimetadavocat-evametadārya subhūte, evametat |
S06n558:226: evaṃ cātra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ yathā āryasubhūtirupadiśati |
S06n558:227: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat-evametatkauśika, evametat |
S06n558:229: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na srotaāpattiphale śikṣate,
S06n558:242: evaṃ sa na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām |
S06n558:245: yo na rūpasya vivṛddhaye śikṣate na parihāṇāya |
S06n558:246: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām |
S06n558:247: yo na vijñānasya vivṛddhaye śikṣate na parihāṇāya,
S06n558:248: sa na rūpasya parigrahāya śikṣate notsargāya |
S06n558:249: evaṃ sa na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām |
S06n558:256: sa na sarvajñatāyā api parigrahāya śikṣate,
S06n558:258: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06n558:260: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-ya āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kasyaciddharmasya parigrahāya śikṣate,
S06n558:262: sa na sarvajñatāyā api parigrahāya śikṣate,
S06n558:264: evaṃ śikṣamāṇa āyuṣmān subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06n558:267: ya āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kasyaciddharmasya parigrahāya śikṣate,
S06n558:269: sa na sarvajñatāyā api parigrahāya śikṣate,
S06n558:273: evaṃ cāyuṣman śāriputra śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06n558:275: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat-prajñāpāramitā ārya śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kuto gaveṣitavyāḥ?
S06n558:276: śāriputra āha-prajñāpāramitā kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena āyuṣmataḥ subhūteḥ parivartādgaveṣitavyā |
S06n558:277: evamukte śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat-kasyaiṣa ārya śāriputra anubhāvo veditavyaḥ?
S06n558:279: āyuṣmān śāriputra āha-tathāgatasyaiṣa kauśika anubhāvo veditavyaḥ |
S06n558:280: tathāgatasyaitadadhiṣṭhānaṃ veditavyaṃ yadāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣate |
S06n558:281: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat-yatkauśika evaṃ vadasi-kasyaiṣo'nubhāvo veditavyaḥ,
S06n558:282: kasyaitadanuṣṭhānaṃ veditavyaṃ yadāryasubhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣate iti ?
S06n558:285: yadapi kauśika evaṃ vadasi-prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kuto gaveṣitavyeti?
S06n558:286: prajñāpāramitā kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na rūpādgaveṣitavyā nāpyanyatra rūpādgaveṣitavyā |
S06n558:287: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārebhyaḥ na vijñānādgaveṣitavyāḥ,
S06n558:292: evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ |
S06n558:295: evamukte śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-mahāpāramiteyamārya subhūte yaduta prajñāpāramitā |
S06n558:305: rūpamahattayā hi kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā |
S06n558:327: kathaṃ punaḥ kauśika ārambaṇānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā?
S06n558:328: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi kauśika yato nānto na madhyaṃ na paryavasānamupalabhyate,
S06n558:330: anena kauśika paryāyeṇa ārambaṇānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā |
S06n558:332: na teṣāmanto vā madhyaṃ vā paryavasānaṃ vā upalabhyate,
S06n558:335: rūpasya hi kauśika nānto na madhyaṃ na paryavasānamupalabhyate |
S06n558:337: vijñānasya hi kauśika nānto na madhyaṃ na paryavasānamupalabhyate |
S06n558:338: anenāpi kauśika paryāyeṇa ārambaṇānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā ||
S06n558:341: na hi sattvasyānto vā madhyaṃ vā paryavasānaṃ vopalabhyate |
S06n558:343: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-kathamāyuṣman subhūte sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā?
S06n558:344: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha-na hi kauśika gaṇanāyogena vā gaṇanābahutvena vā sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā ||
S06n558:345: śakra āha-kathaṃ tarhīdānīmārya subhūte sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā?
S06n558:346: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha-tatkaṃ manyase kauśika katamasyaitaddharmasyādhivacanaṃ yaduta sattvaḥ sattva iti?
S06n558:347: śakra āha-naitadārya subhūte dharmasyādhivacanaṃ na adharmādhivacanaṃ yaduta sattvaḥ sattva iti |
S06n558:351: anārambaṇametannāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yaduta sattvaḥ sattva iti |
S06n558:352: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha-tatkiṃ manyase kauśika kācidatra sattvaparidīpanā kṛtā ?
S06n558:356: sacetkauśika tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho'nantavijñaptighoṣeṇa gambhīranirghoṣeṇa svareṇa gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpānapi vitiṣṭhamānaḥ sattvaḥ sattva iti vācaṃ bhāṣeta,
S06n558:357: api nu tatra kaścitsattva utpanno va utpatsyate vā utpadyate vā,
S06n558:358: niruddho vā nirotsyate vā nirudhyate vā?
S06n558:362: subhūtirāha-anenāpi kauśika paryāyeṇa evaṃ sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā |
S06n558:363: evaṃ ca punaḥ kauśika sattvānantatayā prajñāpāramitānantatā veditavyā ||
S06n558:364: atha khalu sendrakā devāḥ sabrahmakāḥ saprajāpatikāḥ sarṣinaranārīgaṇāstrirudānamudānayanti sma-aho dharmaḥ,
S06n558:368: sa āryeṇa subhūtinā sthavireṇa subhāṣiteneha sūcyate deśyate prakāśyate prabhāvyate |
S06n558:369: tathāgataṃ taṃ vayaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamadyāgreṇa dhārayiṣyāmo yo'nayā prajñāpāramitayā avirahito bhaviṣyati,
S06n558:370: yo'pi ca anena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa vihariṣyati ||
S06n558:371: atha khalu bhagavāṃstān sendrakān sabrahmakān saprajāpatikān sarṣinaranārīgaṇānāmantrayate sma-evametaddevaputrāḥ, evametat |
S06n558:372: yadāhaṃ devaputrā dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike dīpavatyāṃ rājadhānyāmantarāyaṇamadhyagato'nayā prajñāpāramitayā avirahito'bhūvam,
S06n558:373: tadāhaṃ dīpaṃkareṇa tathāgatenārhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhena vyākṛto'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau-bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava anāgate'dhvani asaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpaiḥ śākyamunirnāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyānāṃ ca buddho bhagavāniti |
S06n558:374: atha khalu te devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan-āścaryaṃ bhagavan,
S06n558:376: yāvadiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sarvajñatāyā āhārikā anuparigrāhikā ceti ||
